title: Peppo 日志组件
content:
[[iftags +组件]]
+ 查看页面源代码
[[/iftags]]
[[module CSS]]
.borderstylz {
    border: 1px solid #888;
    padding: 0.3em 0.7em;
    background-color: #EEE;
}

.cellstylz {
    border: 1px solid #888;
    padding: 0.7em;
    text-align:center;
}

.cellstylz2 {
    border: 1px solid #888;
    padding: 0.7em;
}
[[/module]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin: 0px auto 30px auto;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**测试编号**
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**对象**
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**年龄**
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**性别**
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$test}
[[/cell]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$name}
[[/cell]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$age}
[[/cell]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$sex}
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz" colspan="4"]]
方式
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell class="cellstylz2" colspan="4"]]
{$method}
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz" colspan="4"]]
结果
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell class="cellstylz2" colspan="4"]]
{$result}
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
author: ashausesall
